title: "Language Services Market Size To Hit US$ 108.9 Billion By 2032 | Global Industry Report 2024"
excerpt: "BROOKLYN, NY, USA, January 30, 2024 /EINPresswire / -- According to IMARC Group, the global language services market size reached US$ 72.1 Billion in 2023. Looking forward, IMARC Group expects the market to reach US$ 108.9 Billion by 2032, exhibiting a growth rate (CAGR) of 4.6% during 2024-2032."
